job.title: Software Sr Engineer
job.description: ltstronggtltugtJob DescriptionltbrgtltbrgtltugtltstronggtImportant Note During the application process ensure your contact information email and phone number is up to date and upload your current resume when submitting your application for consideration To participate in some selection activities you will need to respond to an invitation The invitation can be sent by both email and text message In order to receive text message invitations your profile must include a mobile phone number designated as Personal Cell or Cellular in the contact information of your applicationltbrgtltbrgtAt Wells Fargo we are looking for talented people who will put our customers at the center of everything we do We are seeking candidates who embrace diversity equity and inclusion in a workplace where everyone feels valued and inspiredltbrgtltbrgtHelp us build a better Wells Fargo It all begins with outstanding talent It all begins with youltbrgtltbrgtTechnology sets IT strategy enhances the design development and operations of our systems optimizes the Wells Fargo infrastructure provides information security and enables Wells Fargo global customers to have 24 hours a day 7 days a week banking access through inbranch online ATMs and other channelsltbrgtltbrgtOur mission is to deliver stable secure scalable and innovative services at speeds that delight and satisfy our customers and unleash the skills potential of our employeesltbrgtltbrgtltstronggtltugtResponsibilitiesltbrgtltbrgtltugtltstronggtDev Squad Developer responsibilities will include but are not limited toltbrgtltbrgtWellsFargo Gateway is a enterprisewide business API channel focused on packaging our products and services as small discrete pieces of functionality that can be delivered to websites mobile devices or customers internal tools WFG Technology Group is seeking a developer for the WFG development squadsltbrgtltulgt ltligtResponsible for designing REST API schemaltligt
